song_lyric:
Crash down in a dream of eden lsle
Sand storms flood the dance floor and the moon
Stars drink up they fall down and cry out for help
Lights go down in a time sand dune

Scan the skies
Light house stars to follow
Music light
To tomorrow

Wake up in a techno eden lsle
Photo flashes life to me and to you
Big bang dj thunders down echoes through the room
Spins the globe we're back in turn

Scan the skies
Light house stars to follow
Music light
To tomorrow
Scan the skies
Light house stars to follow
Music light
To tomorrow

Scan the skies
Light house stars to follow
Music light
To tomorrow
